ModMetaData.name: DocWalledVitals
ModMetaData.author: Dr_Zhivago
ModMetaData.description:
The Doctor's Walled Vitals A small mod that adds a vitals monitor to... well... walls.
Credits: sulusdacor- for his mod "[sd] medicaddons" (which I highly suggest you subscribe to). zzz- for the original mod mine is based off, "Wall Vitals Monitor". And of course all the beautiful mod creators/users out in the RimVerse.
